column2: My friends have managed to smuggle in a rope in a flagon of wine. Wine for the guards and rope for the window! Soon, the bird shall fly its cage!
I did it! Now to find my way home without being captured...
Using a smuggled in rope, [From.GetBestName] almost managed to escape from custody, but the guards caught [From.GetHerHim] in time!
Despite their drunken state, the guards managed to catch me, tie me up and bring me to [From.GetTitledFirstName] when I tried to escape.
I deserve better than to rot in this dank dungeon. I should ask [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] for accommodations suitable to my rank.
My prisoner, [From.GetBestName], is complaining about [From.GetHerHis] dark cell in the dungeon, asking for more suitable accommodations...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] graciously acceded to my request! I am being moved to a decent tower suite.
Cruel [Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] decided I should be forgotten in the Oubliette! This is the end of me...
[From.GetTitledName] has shown mercy and will release me, in return for a future favor.
I can't stop thinking of all those prisoners in my dungeon. They are at my complete mercy... what a thrill it would be to hurt them... to hear the sweet screams, to see the panic in their eyes...
[From.GetTitledFirstName], eyes alight with an ugly glow, has come into my cell with a bag full of tongs and knives!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] freakish chief jailor have come to put me on the rack!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a depraved lunatic! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] sawed my hand off with small knife. It took hours...
I can feel my life fading... but at least, so is the pain of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s torture implements.
I was, perhaps a bit too... enthusiastic torturing [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] did not survive the session.
[captured_commander.GetBestName] was captured in battle and is now my prisoner!

That superstitious fool! [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName] took one look at me and had me dragged away from my cell. The next thing I know am propped up onto a pyre, soldiers shouting and chanting excitedly. "May [enemy_liege.Religion.GetHighGodName] accept this offering...." Then I smell smoke.

A dear friend of mine has been imprisoned by [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]! If I appeal to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], maybe I can get [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] to release my friend from the prison.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] had the audacity to ask me to release one of my prisoners today! The only reason for me to consider complying [From.GetHerHis] request is the support [From.GetSheHe] has from my other vassals.
[From.GetBestName] has managed to effect [From.GetPossPronoun] escape from my dungeon!
Ah well, who will ever know?
I cannot believe this is how it ends.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] sent me back to the dungeon
Very well, I shall be merciful
Maybe [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] has a good reason for the imprisonment of my friend?
Your audacity is your downfall, I will not release your friend!
Let's try something more original this time...
[captured_commander.GetSheHeCap] will make for a suitable sacrifice to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
You order ยงY[captured_commander.GetTitledFirstName]ยง! be offered up to the gods, in exchange for good fortune.\n
Ugh, just throw them in the Brazen Bull...
